name: E. Median String
statement:
You are given two strings s and t, both consisting of exactly k
lowercase Latin letters, s is lexicographically less than t.Let’s
consider list of all strings consisting of exactly k lowercase Latin
letters, lexicographically not less than s and not greater than t
(including s and t) in lexicographical order. For example, for k=2, s=""
and t="" the list will be ["", "", "", "", "", "", ""].Your task is to
print the median (the middle element) of this list. For the example
above this will be ""..
